name: Cross-Wired
description:
Cross-Wired is a top-down two-player game, in which you and player two will work together to beat each level. The levels may seem simple at first - but your controls affect player two's and vice-versa! Work together to find the best solution and be wary of inverting controls!

Controls:
Menu - WASD to navigate, Enter to submit
Player1 - WASD to move, E to Interact.
Player2 - Arrow Keys to move, Right Control to Interact.

Interacting with a switch will open doors and link the two player's inputs together.
Have fun!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Credit where credit is due:
Music - Trevor Lentz - Lines of code https://opengameart.org/content/lines-of-code

GMTK Game Jam Logo - PJBgamer - https://imgur.com/gallery/kaX5sj9

Keyboard Splitter Script - Mitchel Thompson - http://www.angryarugula.com/
